data.title: Wildlife Closure: Several Trails Are Off Limits During Peregrine Falcon Nesting Period
data.description: The Precipice Trail, Jordan Cliffs Trail, Valley Cove Trail, and a portion of the Orange & Black Path are closed to public entry until further notice. Park staff have observed adult peregrine falcons engaging in courtship and pre-nesting behavior.

data.title: Carriage Roads Closed for Mud Season
data.description: Acadia's carriage roads are closed to all users until further notice. Walking, bicycling, and riding horses on them under the current conditions can cause ruts and potholes that will channel water and exacerbate erosion.

data.title: All park roads, facilities and services closed to slow spread of coronavirus (COVID-19)
data.description: In support of federal, state, and local efforts to slow the spread of the novel coronavirus (COVID-19), all park roads, facilities, restrooms, carriage roads, campgrounds, visitor centers and services are closed. Please call or email for park information.
